attributes.action: Remove David Cameron as Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details:
This is a petition from the people of the United Kingdom to have Mr Cameron removed from parliament. 

We have suffered an electoral disaster resulting in a constitutional nightmare whereby a party with 36.9% of the vote now command 100% of the power. Thereby imposing laws, bureaucracy and change upon us, which most of us fundamentally don't agree with. 

We call upon the election of a new Prime Minister under a fairer system whereby the people's views can be represented fairly.
attributes.background: The future of the United Kingdom, relations with the the world, our civil rights, public services and our futures depend on it. Following an economic crisis which has caused the collapse of the middle class, he continues to bring economic uncertainty and wage foreign wars. This should surely end?

rejection.details: The resignation or removal of an individual Minister or Member of Parliament is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
